author: Lynn Lawry
description: Each country (or most) have community based protocols for community based care of Avian influenza or influenza written and practiced with countries by USAID, NGOs, WHO and DoD. These protocols need to be dusted off and rewritten for Ebola that include community based treatment. It is clear more clinics, lack of staff and community distrust is not going to fill facilities which will be a waste of funds and not ready until December (if that).
summary: In 2007, WHO, USAID, DoD all spent millions of dollars writing up protocols for COMMUNITY BASED CARE of patients with Avian Influenza or Influenza epidemics.
title: Avian Influenza protocols: Dust them off and edit
